head.title: Ombudsman Alternative Education, Dropout and Credit Recovery Programs

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Ombudsman Alternative Education, Dropout and Credit Recovery Programs , Ombudsman provides customized solutions to help school districts increase graduation rates and decrease dropout rates. Ombudsman partners with more than 120 public school districts in 20 states to operate more than 130 schools and programs for alternative education, credit recovery and dropout recovery.

div.h3: Learn how Ombudsman empowers students to succeed in school and life.

div.p: In accordance with state and public health guidelines All Ombudsman Illinois locations will remain CLOSED through April 30, 2020; and all Ombudsman Arizona locations will remain closed for the rest of the school year.
Please contact your school location with any questions. Be sure to follow our Facebook page for additional updates and information on all Ombudsman locations. Stay safe and healthy!
Providing alternative education programs for middle and high school students who have dropped out or who are at risk of dropping out of school.
Customized partnerships for alternative education and dropout recovery.
Promoting high levels of student social, academic and behavioral growth and achievement.

div.h4: How a Network of Alternative Schools in Arizona Is Using Personalized Learning to Re-Engage Teens — and Even Some Adults — Who Struggled in Traditional Classrooms (from The 74)
